医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现患有炎症性关节病的男性生育能力并未下降《风湿病年鉴》在线发表的研究表明，患有类风湿性关节炎等炎症性关节疾病的男性比健康同龄人更不可能不生育，而且生育的孩子更多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-finds-no-fertility-decline-in-men-with-炎症-joint-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-finds-no-fertility-decline-in-men-with-炎症-joint-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5b1d40b-7246-48e1-bee4-53edde83201f Mon, 22 Jan 2024 22:27:33 -0500 Study finds no fertility decline in men with inflammatory joint disease
研究确定了影响早产治疗反应的遗传变异加州大学旧金山分校领导的一项研究首次发现了基因变异，可以预测患者是否会对早产治疗产生反应，早产是一种影响美国出生婴儿的十分之一的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-identizes-genic-variants-that-influence-response-to-preterm-birth-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-identizes-genic-variants-that-influence-response-to-preterm-birth-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72b6fea6-3025-4518-ace1-6483e83c6766 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 22:02:55 -0500 Study identifies genetic variants that influence response to preterm birth treatment
长期新冠肺炎和 ME/CFS 患者可以从协调的治疗策略中受益奥塔哥大学的一项新研究发现，患有长期新冠病毒或肌痛性脑脊髓炎/慢性疲劳综合症（ME/CFS）的人可以从协调的治疗策略中受益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Long-COVID-and-MECFS-患者-could-benefit-from-a-cooperative-treatment-strategy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Long-COVID-and-MECFS-病人-could-benefit-from-a-cooperative-treatment-strategy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0e0fdbe-3879-4344-ad6b-14c125a453d5 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 21:56:18 -0500 Long COVID and ME/CFS patients could benefit from a coordinated treatment strategy
研究表明能量饮料消费频率与睡眠参数之间存在密切联系发表在开放获取期刊 BMJ Open 上的一项大型挪威研究发现，减少能量饮料与大学生睡眠质量差和失眠有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-shows-robust-link- Between-Frequency-of-energy-drink-conspiration-and-sleep-parameters.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-shows-robust-link- Between-Frequency-of-energy-drink-conspiration-and-sleep-parameters.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d9e5323-d095-4ca4-b31a-0f6b87e8aa1c Mon, 22 Jan 2024 21:49:18 -0500 Study shows robust link between frequency of energy drink consumption and sleep parameters
研究发现后皮质萎缩可预测阿尔茨海默病由加州大学旧金山分校领导的一个国际研究小组完成了第一项关于后皮质萎缩的大规模研究，后皮质萎缩是一系列令人困惑的视觉空间症状，是阿尔茨海默病的第一个症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Posterior-cortical-atropy-predicts-Alzheimers-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Posterior-cortical-atropy-predicts-Alzheimers-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5ce6b12-b522-4007-a07b-4fecf9dea45b Mon, 22 Jan 2024 21:42:54 -0500 Posterior cortical atrophy predicts Alzheimer's, study finds
骨髓脂肪细胞中发现骨髓瘤的早期预警信号2024 年 1 月 16 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一项新的研究观点，题为“骨髓脂肪细胞为 MGUS 进展为多发性骨髓瘤提供早期迹象”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Early-warning-sign-for-myeloma-found-in-bone-marrow-fat-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Early-warning-sign-for-myeloma-found-in-bone-marrow-fat-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09326fcb-a5d9-4f3e-bb4c-830d25e298b7 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 15:58:00 -0500 Early warning sign for myeloma found in bone marrow fat cells
科学家发现遗传性肾病的新遗传原因基因改变或突变可能导致遗传性肾病，最终可能导致透析或需要肾移植。确定遗传性肾病的病因是确定治疗方法的第一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Scientists-discover-new-genic-cause-of-inherited-kidney-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Scientists-discover-new-genic-cause-of-inherited-kidney-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ccf67a9-b056-431a-9beb-e15ead7ce40c Mon, 22 Jan 2024 15:50:00 -0500 Scientists discover new genetic cause of inherited kidney disease
新的生物标志物可以帮助早期发现狼疮性肾炎狼疮研究先驱钱德拉·莫汉 (Chandra Mohan) 休斯顿大学实验室发现了新的生物标志物，可提高狼疮性肾炎早期检测的诊断性能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/New-biomarkers-could-help-detect-lupus-nephritis-earlier.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/New-biomarkers-could-help-detect-lupus-nephritis-earlier.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc53aa91-3145-49db-bf79-109c2896eabc Mon, 22 Jan 2024 15:42:00 -0500 New biomarkers could help detect lupus nephritis earlier
社会经济条件可以塑造大脑对奖励经历的敏感性麻省理工学院的神经科学家发现，大脑对奖励经历的敏感性 -；动机和注意力的关键因素——；可以由社会经济条件决定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Socioeconomic-conditions-can-shape-the-brains-sensitivity-to-rewarding-experiences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Socioeconomic-conditions-can-shape-the-brains-sensitivity-to-rewarding-experiences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=489eac5b-0347-4262-a360-cbf4d77aec3b Mon, 22 Jan 2024 15:35:00 -0500 Socioeconomic conditions can shape the brain's sensitivity to rewarding experiences
癌症药物有望缩小多囊肾囊肿常染色体显性多囊肾病 (ADPKD) 是多囊肾病最常见的形式，可导致肾脏肿大并最终丧失功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Cancer-drug-holds-promise-for-shrinking-polycystic-kidney-cysts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Cancer-drug-holds-promise-for-shrinking-polycystic-kidney-cysts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98e76e07-a759-4a83-9371-80b6b7f8c8dc Mon, 22 Jan 2024 15:17:00 -0500 Cancer drug holds promise for shrinking polycystic kidney cysts
